{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10103v1", "title": "Numerical approach for solving problems arising from polynomial analysis", "summary": "This paper deals with the use of numerical methods based on random root
sampling techniques to solve some theoretical problems arising in the analysis
of polynomials. These methods are proved to be practical and give solutions
where traditional methods might fall short.", "main_category": "math.NA", "categories": "math.NA,cs.NA,math.CA", "published": "2025-04-14T11:13:11Z"}
